page.title: 07SCHOOLS
page.content: In{Ewyas Harold}there is one{school and one play school. The{old school was built in{1843}and the{new school in{1976.}There are{80 children}in the school in{3 classes,}with 3 teachers, 2 dinner ladies, 2 cleaners and 1 secretary. The bell goes at 9 o'clock and we start the day with assembly. Some people have milk at first play. We used to have cooked meals at dinner time but now everybody has sandwiches. We play Netball, Football, Rounders, and have matches against other schools in the{Golden {Valley.}Two{minibuses}bring about 25 children from the neighbouring villages of{Abbey Dore, Bacton, {Rowlstone}and{Walterstone. {
